name: weekly-review
prompt: Weekly performance review. Run: 1) `botcore get_tuning_dashboard` 2) `botcore get_paper_portfolio` 3) `botcore get_adjustment_history`. Create detailed report with weekly PnL, win rate, strategy breakdown, tuning changes, recommendations. Send to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the report. Do NOT skip sending to Telegram.
